description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Hippies and treehuggers stay out! Enjoy our beautiful nature like real men do - with a shotgun! Put yourself to the ultimate lumberjack challenge, to find and cut down the 1000year old magic oak. This is a top view, classic style shooter for one or two players. Join the epic fight of man against nature, now!.. Oh, and watch out for Rambi, he is pissed off since you killed his mom.
description.short: Hippies and treehuggers stay out! Enjoy our beautiful nature like real men do - with a shotgun! Put yourself to the ultimate lumberjack challenge, to find and cut down the 1000year old magic oak. This is a top view, classic style shooter for one or two players. Join the epic fight of man against nature, now!.. Oh, and watch out for Rambi, he is pissed off since you killed his mom.
